metadata.synopsis: Reactivity on the green dress mannequin as Shadowheart manages to remember a little bit about it after passing a memory check.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0. Recruit Shadowheart1. Go to the shar grotto2. Interact with the mannequins

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: I don't think I ever wore this one. Shame - the colour might have suited me.
0.context: NodeContext: Examining a dress on a mannequin, part of the Sharrans collection of disguises. This one doesn't stir any memories.
